name: YouTube – Custom Colors Video Progress Bar
description: I'll keep this updated. Be sure to check out my other userstyles as well.

user.name: Crystallis
user.about: Commenting and rating is always appreciated. ツ

additional_info: 2015-09-17 - initial release 2015-09-21 - added support for the YouTube logo in embedded players 2016-01-10 - fixed the live badge color 2016-02-11 - fixed the new loop button 2016-02-15 - added support for the embedded play button 2016-03-04 - fixed the updated volume bar 2016-04-23 - fixed the updated volume bar ..again 2016-05-10 - fixed loop button 2016-05-25 - added support for 3D icon badge and updated screenshot 2016-07-09 - added support for the Chrome extension "Mini YouTube"
